title: As Punjab promotes teachers with no expertise in subjects; question mark over ‘flawed’ rules
selftext: Majority of promoted teachers, who would now teach class 11 and 12, haven’t studied those subjects in graduation. For instance, 227 teachers promoted as commerce lecturers haven’t passed B.Com
comments: There were English teachers with MA in English who couldn't speak english at all. Most of English teachers use translate to teach in schools
some teachers get a job through connection or bribes and political connections.
Add jammu to this. Universities there are not hiring teachers full time. Classes are empty, one teacher handling multiple subjects with 50% salary.
